data.title: setup(entrypoints)
getPanel(id)
data.context:
Get panel with specified id Returns: UxpPanelInfo - - panel object for a valid id
                          null for an invalid id | Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | String | panel id |

data.title: getCommand(id)
data.context:
Get command with specified id Returns: UxpCommandInfo - - command object for a valid id
                            null for an invalid id | Param | Type | Description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| id | String | command id |
